group_1.textLeft: ...Over here!@Come look, Kaede!

group_1.textRight: ...Wow! There are cherry blossoms~!

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle*

group_1.textRight: I can't believe some winter cherry blossom trees@were planted around here.

group_1.textLeft: You know, I noticed them the day before yesterday@when I was taking a walk.
Since they're so beautiful, I really wanted to show@someone while they're still in full bloom...

group_1.textRight: So, that was why you invited me for a walk?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, and thank you for coming.

group_1.textRight: No, I should be saying that!@Thank you for inviting me.
The cherry blossoms are so pretty, and the@clear morning winter air feels good...
...A-ah... Ah...@[chara:101151:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:101151:cheek_0:motion_100:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json:eyeClose_1][chara:101151:lipSynch_1][chara:101151:effect_shake]Achoo!

group_1.textLeft: Huh?!@Are you all right, Kaede?

group_1.textRight: Ah...@It might be a little too cold for me this morning...

group_1.textLeft: Ah, the weatherman mentioned today would be@the coldest day of the season...

group_1.textRight: I see...@He was right after all~...

group_1.textLeft: I'm really sorry...! I invited you out here on@such a frigid day...

group_1.textRight: No! I'm okay, really.
Since I take care of the vegetable garden in the@morning, I'm used to the cold.

group_1.textLeft: Really...?

group_1.textRight: What about you, Konomi?
Even though it's so cold, don't you usually@go on walks alone...?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, since there are so few people outside in the@morning, you can see the flowers on the roadside@better, you know?
So even if it's cold, I feel better just by walking.

group_1.textRight: Oh, I see.
...When it gets a little warmer, more flowers will@start blooming.
Maybe I'll start copying you and take walks in@the morning~!

group_1.textLeft: Really?!
When that time comes, shall we walk around@together again?

group_1.textRight: Yeah!

group_1.textLeft: Ah, how about basking in the sunshine afterwards?

group_1.textRight: Basking in sunshine...?

group_1.textLeft: Right!
Besides just going on walks, I also like to take@long baths and sunbathe.
Very few people understand just how good it is,@however...
I feel like you would understand!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I totally get it~!

group_1.textLeft: Really...?!

group_1.textRight: You know, my grandmother also likes to take long@baths and go sunbathing.
And she says she takes walks everyday just like you...
Thanks to the both of you, I'm going to discover@what makes it so good!

group_1.textLeft: Kaede...

group_1.textRight: What is it?

group_1.textLeft: I'm not an old lady yet...!

group_1.textRight: [chara:101151:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh?
